item.title: UN votes on a fact-finding mission into Iran, but don’t look at it too closely
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: The UN HRC approved a fact-finding investigation into human rights violations in Iran. However, the vote reveals three disturbing facts about the Council and its ability to protect human rights.

item.title: Russia booted out of the UN Human Rights Council. What's next?
item.author: Elvira_Ineza
item.description: Following the General Assembly declaring the annexation of Ukrainian illegal, Russia's presence on the UN Security Council has officially lost its legal basis.

item.title: China in Focus at UN "Selective Rights Council" (UNRC)
item.author: Adrian Liberto
item.description: The Human Rights Council passed a resolution on the protection against violence and discrimination based on sexual orientation and gender identity.

item.title: Update on UN-aligned’s open letter to the United Nations Human Rights Council
item.author: Ariana Yekrangi
item.description: UN-aligned’s open letter to the UNHRC which called for a ban on countries that criminalise LGBTQ+ from forming part of the commission will be delayed owing to the latest developments in the United Nations and the ongoing war in Ukraine.

item.title: UN-aligned calls on UNHRC to ban members that criminalise homosexuality
item.author: Adrian Liberto
item.description: This is an open letter drafted by UN-aligned and addressed to the President of the United Nations Human Rights Commission.
